attributes.action: build youth center in northfield , birmingham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as most areas may know that there is need for youth centers needed in all areas of england but 2day im asking you to sign this petition to try to get a center built in northfield as many and most of the children in this area have no where to go in the evenings holidays and weekends there is desperate need for one so please sign for me

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
